text: Omar Sowe (born 28 October 2000) is a Gambian-born-American soccer player who plays as a forward for New York Red Bulls II in the USL Championship. ==Early career== Raised in Harrison, New Jersey, Sowe attended Harrison High School and became the school's all time leading scorer in October 2018. He finished his four year high school career with 89 goals and 67 assists, as well as being named to the NJSCAA All-State team in 2017 and 2018. Sowe began playing with the New York Red Bulls academy in 2018. He also appeared for the club's USL League Two side New York Red Bulls U-23. ==Professional== ===New York Red Bulls II=== Sowe signed his first professional contract with the New York Red Bulls II on August 16, 2019. He made his professional debut on August 24, 2019, appearing as a 66th-minute substitute during a 5-1 victory over Swope Park Rangers. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Domestic Cup !colspan="2"|Play-Offs !colspan="2"|CONCACAF !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |New York Red Bulls U23 |2019 |4||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||4||0 |- |rowspan="2"|New York Red Bulls II |2019 |5||2||0||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||6||2 |- |2020 |14||7||colspan="2"|—||0||0||colspan="2"|—||14||7 |- !colspan="2"|Career total !23!!9!!0!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!24!!9 |} ==References== == External links == Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Gambian footballers Category:American soccer players Category:New York Red Bulls U-23 players Category:New York Red Bulls II players Category:People from Harrison, New Jersey Category:Soccer players from New Jersey Category:USL League Two players Category:USL Championship players Category:Association football forwards
